1.0.name: wordpress/icy
1.0.description: Icy is a clean and elegant blogging theme with Post Formats. Responsive layout and Retina ready icons & images makes this theme look beautiful on any device. Easy to use Theme Options panel, integrated Customizer, Custom Menu and 6 Widget Areas will allow you to easily customize your website. Icy is build on the latest WordPress and web standards such as HTML5 & CSS3, it's also child theme friendly.
